_comment: File is auto-generated, do not edit it manually.
_description: File contains deprecated tokens that are no longer supported and will be removed in the future.

s.comment: The `min-width` for mobile devices, such as phones and tablets.

zero.comment: Full-width and background containers. Fixed navigation containers such as headers, and side-panels.

half.comment: Use this for subtle and small components that don't require to group complex information like Status Indicators, Checkboxes and Color Swatches.

x2.comment: Use this for all the containers and popups: All Cards, Modals, Tooltips and Toasts.

x4.comment: (Mobile) Primary containers that house a large amount of other elements and complex information

x6.comment: (Mobile) Full width sheets that are temporary and modal views

round.comment: Commonly used for our standard buttons and profile avatars: All Primary, Secondary Buttons, Radio Buttons and Notification Badges.

zero.deprecatedComment: Use semantic padding and gap values instead

half.deprecatedComment: Use semantic padding and gap values instead

x1.deprecatedComment: Use semantic padding and gap values instead
x1.comment: Compact spacing between text or icons

x2.deprecatedComment: Use semantic padding and gap values instead
x2.comment: Commonly used to group compact elements like icon buttons

x3.deprecatedComment: Use semantic padding and gap values instead
x3.comment: Use when compact padding is required

x4.deprecatedComment: Use semantic padding and gap values instead
x4.comment: Default space token. Used to group Inputs with related data

x6.deprecatedComment: Use semantic padding and gap values instead

x8.deprecatedComment: Use semantic padding and gap values instead
x8.comment: • Standard spacing between cards; • Used to separate groups of content ; • Separate section headings or titles from body text or inputs

x10.comment: • Used for outer margins on the overall page content ; • Used for inner margins on large items such as page sections

x16.comment: - Use to de-clutter your UI when a lot of space is available; - Separate banner sections from page content; - Use to differentiate page content like page sections

x20.deprecatedComment: Use semantic padding and gap values instead
x20.comment: - Use sparingly; - Helps to put focus on the primary element within your page; - Use to de-clutter your UI when a lot of space is available

stronger.comment: Active state for segmented control, Pill

strong.deprecatedComment: Use sys.color.accent.muted.default token instead with sys.color.accent.overlay.hover

stronger.deprecatedComment: replace static.gold.stronger with {sys.color.static.amber.stronger}. Prefer to replace with `sys.color.bg.caution.stronger` if used as a background color.
